artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Author: Mōri Narimoto
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: はち巻に　江戸むらさきの　横霞　いまぞなにわも　春に成田や　土筆亭和気有丈 {Hachimaki ni edomurasaki no yokogasumi imazo Naniwa mo haru ni Naritaya, Tsukushitei Wake no Aritake} (Wearing / A head-band / In the Edo Purple mist: / Now the people of Osaka / Can also enjoy the Spring; transl. from Bowie 1979)
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
signed: 香蝶楼國貞画 {Kōchōrō Kunisada ga}
title: Actor Ichikawa Danjūrō VII as Sukeroku
